ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] A little from me...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... a ... Yeah, I kept getting kicked too. There were over 200 people in the plane of knowledge. ... they ... Before I went to bed there was a lvl 36 froggy on
ygData.messageBody:
> That would explain why I was repeatedly disconnected last night. It was
> getting extremely annoying. It didn't even occur to me that not only were
> the servers unstable after the new expansion, but that there were probably
a
> million people playing with their new Froglok characters.
>
Yeah, I kept getting kicked too. There were over 200 people in the plane of
knowledge.
>
> Speaking of Frogloks, I have seen many that were already in their 20s, and
> it was the first day. I can only imagine how long those people have been
> playing yesterday... probably hours and hours on end. It's amazing that
they
> don't have anything to do on a Monday of all days.
>
Before I went to bed there was a lvl 36 froggy on Monday.
Someone was asking ooc how that was possible. My answer: DSL and high lvl
friends to PL.
Of which I have neither. :-(
>
> I do not have the expansion yet. I might have mentioned this, but I am
> unfortunately using dial up, and the download would have taken more than 6
> hours. Therefore, I am waiting until the expansion hits stores in a week
or
> so and purchasing it that way. I can't wait to use the new features, such
as
> the map. That was an excellent idea and will definitely make traveling
much
> easier.
>
Yeah, it took me for freaking ever to dl all those files. 19.2kbps
connection sucks ass. And it goes lower when it rains...
>
> On another note, does anyone know anything about the new creatures that
you
> may purchase for riding, such as a horse? Are they more expensive than
> horses? I have wanted a horse for the longest time, but I'm afraid it's
> tough to make money... especially being a caster. When grouped, the melee
> types loot the corpses before I can get to them usually.
>
I asked Valcorie how much she paid for her dinosaur and she said about 9k.
luv,
-Su
